{
  "name": "fashion-ecommerce-platform",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "serve": "vite preview"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^6.14.0",
    "axios": "^1.3.0",
    "classnames": "^2.3.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "vite": "^4.0.0",
    "typescript": "^5.0.0",
    "vite-plugin-react": "^3.0.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.2.0",
    "postcss": "^8.4.0",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.0"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "description": "A fashion eCommerce platform built with Vite and React."
}

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; interface StyleGuideProps {} const StyleGuide: React.FC = () => { return (

Style Guide

Discover the latest trends and outfit combinations that define luxury fashion for young adults.

Style Inspiration

Explore bold colors and modern designs that elevate your wardrobe.

Outfit Combinations

Mix and match pieces to create stunning looks for any occasion.

Fashion Advice

Get tips on how to style your outfits and stay ahead of the trends.

Seasonal Style Guides

Stay fashionable year-round with our seasonal recommendations.

Back to Home
); }; export default StyleGuide;

Contact Us
